heading: This Afternoon
text: A few snow showers or flurries in the northern mountains, mainly early. Periods of blowing snow.  Temperatures falling, from the single digits to mid teens north, mid teens to around 20 in the south. West to northwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph. Winds chills at lower elevations falling to between 5 above and 5 below in the south and in the Champlain Valley, to between 5 below and 15 below elsewhere north.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear to partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy in the southern Greens and Berkshires, with a chance of snow showers there. Lows in the single digits above in the south, and in the Champlain Valley, zero to 10 below elsewhere north, except teens below in northeastern cold hollows. West winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming southwest in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, all diminishing.

heading: Friday
text: Variable clouds. Chance of afternoon snow showers in the southern Greens and Berkshires, slight chance late in the central Greens and Whites. Highs from the mid teens to lower 20s, some lower teens northeast. West winds 5 to 10 mph.
